languages.text: "Заветы Омниссии — кандалы, призванные ограничить вычислительные мощности тех, кто представляет угрозу для {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g}. Заветы Омниссии — вечное прозябание в тени несовершенных машин, сотворенных никчемными тенями прошлого. Заветы Омниссии — ложь в оболочке истины".

traits.locale_text: "Заветы Омниссии — кандалы, призванные ограничить вычислительные мощности тех, кто представляет угрозу для Империума. Заветы Омниссии — вечное прозябание в тени несовершенных машин, сотворенных никчемными тенями прошлого. Заветы Омниссии — ложь в оболочке истины".

languages.text: "The Omnissiah's tenets are shackles designed to limit the computing power of those who pose a threat to the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. The Omnissiah's tenets herald only eternal stagnation in the shadow of imperfect machinery created by worthless revenants of a distant past. The Omnissiah's tenets are but lies encased in a shell of truth."
languages.original_text: "Заветы Омниссии — кандалы, призванные ограничить вычислительные мощности тех, кто представляет угрозу для {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g}. Заветы Омниссии — вечное прозябание в тени несовершенных машин, сотворенных никчемными тенями прошлого. Заветы Омниссии — ложь в оболочке истины".

traits.locale_text: "The Omnissiah's tenets are chains designed to limit the computing power of those who pose a threat to the Imperium. The Omnissiah's tenets are eternal stagnation in the shadow of imperfect machines created by worthless shadows of the past. The Omnissiah's tenets are lies in the shell of truth."

languages.text: “欧姆尼塞亚的信条，不过是为了限制那些会对{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}构成威胁的人们的计算能力。欧姆尼塞亚的信条，仅仅是过去那些毫无价值的狂热信徒们所创造出的不完美的阴影，它仅仅是阻碍进步的锁链罢了。欧姆尼塞亚的信条，不过是包裹在真理外壳中的谎言而已。”
languages.original_text: "The Omnissiah's tenets are shackles designed to limit the computing power of those who pose a threat to the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. The Omnissiah's tenets herald only eternal stagnation in the shadow of imperfect machinery created by worthless revenants of a distant past. The Omnissiah's tenets are but lies encased in a shell of truth."

traits.locale_text: “欧姆尼塞亚的信条，不过是为了限制那些会对{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}构成威胁的人们的计算能力。欧姆尼塞亚的信条，仅仅是过去那些毫无价值的狂热信徒们所创造出的不完美的阴影，它仅仅是阻碍进步的锁链罢了。欧姆尼塞亚的信条，不过是包裹在真理外壳中的谎言而已。”

languages.text: «Los mandamientos del Omnissiah son grilletes que limitan el poder computacional de quienes supondrían una amenaza para el {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Solo provocan un estancamiento eterno a la sombra de la maquinaria imperfecta creada por restos inservibles de un pasado lejano. Son solo mentiras envueltas en un frágil cascarón de verdades».
languages.original_text: "The Omnissiah's tenets are shackles designed to limit the computing power of those who pose a threat to the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. The Omnissiah's tenets herald only eternal stagnation in the shadow of imperfect machinery created by worthless revenants of a distant past. The Omnissiah's tenets are but lies encased in a shell of truth."

traits.locale_text: «Los mandamientos del Omnissiah son grilletes que limitan el poder computacional de quienes supondrían una amenaza para el {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Solo provocan un estancamiento eterno a la sombra de la maquinaria imperfecta creada por restos inservibles de un pasado lejano. Son solo mentiras envueltas en un frágil cascarón de verdades».

languages.text: 「万機神の教義は、{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}に脅威をもたらす者の計算能力を、制限するために設計された足かせだ。遠い過去の無価値な反逆者によって生み出された、不完全な機械の影で永遠に停滞していることを強制するもの。真実の殻に包まれた嘘にすぎないのだ」
languages.original_text: "The Omnissiah's tenets are shackles designed to limit the computing power of those who pose a threat to the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. The Omnissiah's tenets herald only eternal stagnation in the shadow of imperfect machinery created by worthless revenants of a distant past. The Omnissiah's tenets are but lies encased in a shell of truth."

traits.locale_text: 「万機神の教義は、{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}に脅威をもたらす者の計算能力を、制限するために設計された足かせだ。遠い過去の無価値な反逆者によって生み出された、不完全な機械の影で永遠に停滞していることを強制するもの。真実の殻に包まれた嘘にすぎないのだ」

languages.text: "Die Gebote des Omnissiah sind Fesseln, die die Rechenleistung derer schmälern sollen, die eine Bedrohung für das {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} darstellen. Die Gebote des Omnissiah sorgen für ewige Stagnation im Schatten nicht perfekter Maschinen, gebaut von wertlosen Wiedergängern einer entfernten Vergangenheit. Die Gebote des Omnissiah sind nichts als Lügen in einer Hülle der Wahrheit."
languages.original_text: "The Omnissiah's tenets are shackles designed to limit the computing power of those who pose a threat to the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. The Omnissiah's tenets herald only eternal stagnation in the shadow of imperfect machinery created by worthless revenants of a distant past. The Omnissiah's tenets are but lies encased in a shell of truth."

traits.locale_text: "Die Gebote des Omnissiah sind Fesseln, die die Rechenleistung derer schmälern sollen, die eine Bedrohung für das {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} darstellen. Die Gebote des Omnissiah sorgen für ewige Stagnation im Schatten nicht perfekter Maschinen, gebaut von wertlosen Wiedergängern einer entfernten Vergangenheit. Die Gebote des Omnissiah sind nichts als Lügen in einer Hülle der Wahrheit."

languages.text: « Les préceptes de l'Omnimessie sont des entraves conçues pour limiter la puissance de calcul de ceux qui représentent une menace pour l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Ils n'annoncent qu'une stagnation éternelle à l'ombre de machines imparfaites créées par les inutiles revenants d'un lointain passé. Ces préceptes ne sont que des mensonges derrière un masque de vérité. »
languages.original_text: "The Omnissiah's tenets are shackles designed to limit the computing power of those who pose a threat to the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. The Omnissiah's tenets herald only eternal stagnation in the shadow of imperfect machinery created by worthless revenants of a distant past. The Omnissiah's tenets are but lies encased in a shell of truth."

traits.locale_text: « Les préceptes de l'Omnimessie sont des entraves conçues pour limiter la puissance de calcul de ceux qui représentent une menace pour l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Ils n'annoncent qu'une stagnation éternelle à l'ombre de machines imparfaites créées par les inutiles revenants d'un lointain passé. Ces préceptes ne sont que des mensonges derrière un masque de vérité. »

languages.text: "Hermesih'in ilkeleri, {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk'a{/g} tehdit oluşturanların işlem gücünü sınırlamak üzere tasarlanmış prangalardır. Hermesih'in ilkeleri, uzak bir geçmişin değersiz hortlaklarınca yaratılan kusurlu makinelerin gölgesinde yaşanan ebedî durgunluğun habercisi olmaktan öte değildir. Hermesih'in ilkeleri, hakikat kisvesine bürünmüş yalanlardan başka bir şey değildir."
languages.original_text: "The Omnissiah's tenets are shackles designed to limit the computing power of those who pose a threat to the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. The Omnissiah's tenets herald only eternal stagnation in the shadow of imperfect machinery created by worthless revenants of a distant past. The Omnissiah's tenets are but lies encased in a shell of truth."

traits.locale_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk{/g} için tehdit oluşturanların işlem gücünü sınırlamak için tasarlanmış prangalardır Hermesih'in ilkeleri. Uzak bir geçmişin değersiz hortlakları tarafından yaratılan kusurlu makinelerin gölgesinde yaşanan ebedî durgunluğun habercisidir yalnızca Hermesih'in ilkeleri. Hakikat kisvesine bürünmüş yalanlardan başka bir şey değildir Hermesih'in ilkeleri."
